san-lo-mvu10:7: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || dvitīyā bhūmito tṛtīyāṁ bhūmiḥ saṁkramantānāṁ bodhisatvānāṁ naravarātmaja kīdṛśaṁ jāyate cittam iti ||
san-lo-mvu10:14: taṁ ca na ātmasukhārthāya na api bodheḥ kathaṁcana ||
san-lo-mvu10:28: yāvaj jīvante amuṣyāṁ pelāyāṁ duṣkṛtaṁ kṛtaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:30: idam uvāca prītātmā asti eṣā subhāṣitā ||
san-lo-mvu10:31: tasya mūlyaṁ tava śīrṣaṁ tyaktvā śīrṣam ity abravīt* |

san-lo-mvu10:42: gṛhyatāṁ dīyatāṁ gāthā yuktaṁ bhavatu mā ciraṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:47: uṣitaṁ narakeṣu varaṁ na ca kupuruṣasaṁśrayaniketaḥ ||
san-lo-mvu10:48: amātyaṁ saṁjayaṁ nāma piśāco idam abravīt* |
san-lo-mvu10:49: svakaṁ me hṛdayaṁ dehi śṛṇu gāthāṁ subhāṣitāṁ ||
san-lo-mvu10:50: svakan te hṛdayaṁ demi brūhi gāthāṁ subhāṣitāṁ |

san-lo-mvu10:57: śreṣṭhiṁ vasundharaṁ nāma daridro idam abravīt* |
san-lo-mvu10:58: iyaṁ subhāṣitā gāthā sarvasvena tu dīyate ||

san-lo-mvu10:68: śūnyāny ākīrṇā ca santi ekenāpi prajānatā ||

san-lo-mvu10:82: iyaṁ subhāṣitā gāthā dehi mānsaṁ śṛṇohi tāṁ ||

san-lo-mvu10:111: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || ye punar bho jinaputra bodhisatvāḥ tṛtīyāyāṁ bhūmau vartante kathaṁ caturthāyāṁ bhūmau vivartanti iti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapam uvāca || caturdaśabhir bho dhutadharmadhara ākārair bodhisatvāḥ tṛtīyāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāḥ caturthāyāṁ bhūmau vivartante || katamehi caturdaśehi || akṣavaṁkadyūtakrīḍānuyogam anuyuktāś ca bhavanti | atyabhīkṣṇaṁ vivekaṁ sevanti | rājyaṁ ca kārāpayamāṇā lobhenābhibhūtā atrāntaravijitavāsināṁ sarvasvahāriṇo bhavanti | aparādhaṁ ca ananuyujyā vadham ākṣepayanti | badhyāṁś ca na saṁgopāyanti | puruṣāṁś ca vadhrayanti | vipratipannāś ca bhavanti | na ca bhogayātrāyāṁ saṁvibhajanti vidyamāneṣu vibhaveṣu | pravrajitvā ca samyaksaṁbuddhānāṁ bhāṣatāṁ vā bāhuśrutyaṁ na paryāpnuvanti | purā praṇidhitvā ca bāhuśrutyaṁ na deśayanti | āmiṣapratibaddhāṁś ca sevanti na dharmapratibaddhā | na cābhīkṣṇaṁ buddhavarṇaṁ bhāṣanti | samyaksaṁbuddhāṁś ca lokasamatāye deśenti | na ca samyaksaṁbuddhāṁ lokottarā iti bodhayanti || imehi bho dhutadharmadhara caturdaśabhir ākāraiḥ bodhisatvāḥ tṛtīyāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāś caturthāyāṁ bhūmau vivartanti || ye hi kecid bho dhatudharmadhara bodhisatvāḥ tṛtīyāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāḥ caturthāyāṁ bhūmau vivartensuḥ vivartanti vivartiṣyanti vā sarve te imehi caturdaśehir ākārair nāto bhūya iti ||
san-lo-mvu10:112: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapa āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || ye punar bho jinaputra bodhisatvā avaivartiyā prathamaṁ cittam utpādayanti bodhāya kevarūpeṇa sukhena yujyanti kevattakāś ca satvā sukhasātasaṁgatā bhavantīti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapaṁ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣi ||
san-lo-mvu10:131: atha khalu nāmatidevo nāma trāyastriṁśako bodhisatvo bhūto ekāṁsam uttarāsaṅgaṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavanto dṛṣṭo tenāṁjaliṁ praṇamayya bhagavantam abhistutaḥ saṁmukhaṁ vaśībhūtagaṇasya imaiḥ ślokaiḥ ||
